abstract: Merrill Lynch and Bank of America on Wednesday named Merrill’s Andrea Orcel as head of international investment and private banking at the combined company, Reuters said, citing an internal memo.
lead_paragraph: Merrill Lynch and Bank of America on Wednesday named Merrill’s Andrea Orcel as head of international investment and private banking at the combined company, Reuters said, citing an internal memo.

headline.main: Merrill Executive to Take Key Role in New Regime
